title: Anti-Shock Protective Film for Oppo Reno 12 Pro - 3mk SilverProtection+
description:
SilverProtection+

Protective film for Oppo Reno 12 Pro

Antimicrobial

Kills up to 99% of bacteria, viruses, fungi, and mould

Increases durability

Strengthens your smartphone's screen by up to 400%!

Works around the clock

Destroys viruses, bacteria, fungi, and mould 24/7

Antimicrobial

Did you know that silver has 6000 years of experience in eliminating microorganisms? It has been used since ancient times, and now we have too! We have equipped the SilverProtection+ film with an antimicrobial coating based on silver nanoparticles. It's the only screen protection that ensures your safety while killing 99% of known viruses, bacteria, fungi, and mould. The coating works 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, maintaining full safety even when you can't properly disinfect your smartphone.

Wet application

SilverProtection+ is a breakthrough in installation. It has never been easier! You can apply the film using a special gel, which is 100% safe for the display, included in the package. Air bubbles and dust particles? Forget about them! The wet application guarantees excellent results and requires no prior experience.

Increased durability

SilverProtection+ enhances your smartphone's screen durability by up to 400%. Incredible, right? The multilayer structure of the film includes an impact-resistant layer that minimizes the risk of damaging your phone. Replacing the display can be costly and time-consuming. Save yourself that trouble.

Comfortable

Without unnecessary introductions – with SilverProtection+, we have combined what is essential. The film is so flexible that it fits snugly and permanently even to the most curved displays. Your finger glides over it like on tempered glass! And the cherry on top: a high-quality oleophobic layer that makes maintenance easier.

Self-healing

To extend the lifespan of the film, we have applied the Self-Heal™ coating. This means that SilverProtection+ repairs minor damages or scratches that occur during phone use on its own. Self-Heal™ ensures that you can enjoy an ideally smooth surface of the film for even longer!

Durability sewn with nylon thread

Ultra durability

thanks to the nylon construction

Three pockets

for cards, documents, or cash

title: Screen protector for Apple iPhone Air - 3mk 1UP screen protector (3 pieces)
description:
First screen protection on the market created for mobile gamers by 3mk Protection.

Feel the difference on the screen!

It provides faster touch response and perfect finger glide across the screen's surface.

No dust and oily stains

The oleophobic layer reduces dust attraction and the formation of oily stains.

Simplicity and reliability

1UP offers quick and easy installation, and three sheets of film in one package.

Increased finger glide and faster touch response

Fewer worries. More focus. The 1UP screen protector is a film that strengthens your smartphone’s screen, ensuring that your device withstands every game! It’s only 0.23 mm thick, so it doesn’t reduce touch sensitivity, and your finger glides over it like it’s tempered glass.

No dust and oily stains

Resistance to dust and stains? That’s one thing. However, anyone who has ever played or even just sent SMS knows how annoying the phenomenon, commonly referred to as "screen smudging," can be. Stains on the display reduce visibility, not to mention the aesthetics and hygiene aspects.

And who hasn’t wiped stains off the screen with a sleeve or another piece of clothing? Exactly. However, the 1UP screen protector is resistant to smudging. Even when you’re playing and eating something delicious!

Simplicity and reliability

We don’t like air bubbles, difficult installations, and short expiry dates that make a new film practically useless after 3, 2, 1… That’s why the 1UP screen protector offers quick and easy installation, and comes with three of our films in one package—each with a durability rating of up to 20,000 cycles.

It’s the best performance and great conditions for gaming for 4 months! After that? If you want, you can replace the film with a new one and keep playing!

Up to 400% screen reinforcement

1UP is a new brand from 3mk and the creator of the screen protector—a transparent film that combines everything new technologies offer for smartphones. It’s not just about more fun while playing thanks to its sensory properties, but also enhanced screen durability (up to 400%!) and a few other little details you’ll definitely appreciate.

If you’re almost never without your phone, you’ll know you can expect more from your film. And we know that this "more" makes all the difference!

Simple and safe wet installation

The 1UP screen protector is installed wet using a special gel that is safe for your smartphone.

This ensures quick and easy installation of the film, which will perfectly protect your smartphone’s screen.

Does not distort colors and screen brightness

During the most intense gameplay, every detail matters. That’s why we paid special attention to ensuring that the film, aside from incredible protection, doesn’t distort the displayed image in any way.

You’ll win because nothing will escape your attention.

Set includes
•3 pcs. 1UP screen protector for Apple iPhone Air screen,
•squeegee - for removing air bubbles,
•Cleaning Set - for cleaning the screen,
•10 ml installation gel,
•packaging.

Armoured case for Samsung Galaxy A36/A56 - 3mk Armor Case

Reinforced corners for even better protection

Secure

Military Grade drop test

Armoured

Absorbs impact energy

If you're looking for a more delicate case, check out the other offerings from 3mk Protection.
